job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: blue rose is currently seeking someone with the skills to help us improve the publicfacing systems of a federal client specifically you will implement a new chatbot product to enhance customer experience and reduce operational costs by using conversational ai technology natural language processing nlp and other cognitive apis you will develop train and evaluate natural language processing nlp models for the deployed conversational ai platformltbrgtltbrgtthe successful candidate willltbrgtltulgtltligtuse statistical analysis and programming to analyze and interpret language datasets ltligtltligtprovide expertise in ai services including natural language processing and ml architectureltligtltligtanalyze training and test data to help fine tune semantic models to improve overall accuracy and performanceltligtltligtdevelop supervised and unsupervised learning models to provide actionable insights for business requirementsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtrequirementsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtmust be us citizenltligtltligtexperienced in machine learning concepts and algorithms python x scikitlearn natural language tool kit and sql relational or nosqlltligtltligtpreferred experience with backend web development java mongodynamodb nodejs and restful architectureltbrgtltligtltulgtthe salary for this position is annuallyltbrgtltbrgtpowered by jazzhrltbrgtltbrgtqnxetdedtq
